# Canada Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Number
* W8474-238300

## Tender Status
The tender notice for the following contract has been cancelled:

* Solicitation Number: W8474-238300
* Title: None Provided
* Description: This tender notice was for a Request for Proposal (RFP) - Competitive - Open Bidding.

## Important Details
* The solicitation number is W8474-238300.
* The tender notice was for a Request for Proposal (RFP) - Competitive - Open Bidding.
* The trade agreements applicable to this tender are:
  * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* The regions of opportunity for this tender were worldwide.
* The regions of delivery for this tender were the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Contact Information
For any inquiries regarding this tender notice, please contact:
* Brooke Monette
* Phone: None Provided
* Email: [brooke.monette@forces.gc.ca](mailto:brooke.monette@forces.gc.ca)

Please note that there is no official Canadian government tender document attached to this notice.

I removed all the unnecessary details and included only the relevant information. The rewritten entry includes information regarding the solicitation number, tender status, important details, and contact information. Remember to consult the source document when preparing a final professional version as there might be additional information. Make sure you have the most current data and avoid any errors. 
Feel free to ask for any further modifications!
